name: Bushlife design system - by Overlay (Made with Auto-Layout And Variants)
description:
Bushlife is a design system of components and styles tailor-made to be exported into high quality code with Overlay Plugin.


It can also simply be used as a design-only file of course.


It's 100% editable


How to use it with Overlay plugin?


  1. Download Overlay plugin and create a project with the desired framework (Vue, React, Html...)
  2. Play with the design system of components and styles as you want to create your custom version
  3. Generate the code you need to build your next application with Overlay plugin.


Don't know about Overlay?


  1. Visit our website
  2. Sign-up and create a first project
  3. Test and learn how to generate code using our Playground file


Some improvement ideas? Want to collaborate on Bushlife?


  1. Just email contact@overlay-tech.com
  2. Send us you ideas or even a Figma file. We’ll add the components in Bushlife


Have fun!
